several strong baseline methods.from sentence: In the experiments , we evaluate and compare our model with several strong baseline methods including : LSTM / Bi - LSTM , tree - structured LSTM ( Tree - LSTM ) , LSTM regularized by linguistic knowledge ( LR - LSTM ) , CNNrand / CNN - static / CNN - non-static ( Kim , 2014 ) , very deep convolutional network ( VD - CNN ) , and character - level convolutional network ( CL - CNN ) .
